recipe.title: BBQ Cheeseburger Nachos Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 lb ; ground beef, cooked and drained ; (455 g)
½ cup ; fresh parsley, chopped ; (20 g)

steps.step: In a large pan or skillet, lay down half of the tortilla chips, followed by half of the ground beef, bbq sauce, cheddar, mozzarella, tomato, red onion, bacon, and parsley. Repeat with the remaining half of the ingredients, followed by a drizzle of BBQ sauce on top.
Bake for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large pan or skillet, lay down half of the tortilla chips, followed by half of the ground beef, bbq sauce, cheddar, mozzarella, tomato, red onion, bacon, and parsley.
Repeat with the remaining half of the ingredients, followed by a drizzle of BBQ sauce on top.
Bake for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted.
